app.description: javascript version of awk for bioinformatics

option.name: formatString
option.label: Format
option.description: force format: one of VCF BAM SAM FASTQ FASTA BLAST DBSNP. BLAST is BLAST XML version 1. DBSNP is XML output of NCBI dbsnp. INSDSEQ is XML output of NCBI EFetch rettype=gbc.

option.name: jsonFile
option.label: JSON
option.description: Optional. Reads a JSON File using google gson (https://google-gson.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/gson/docs/javadocs/index.html ) and injects it as 'userData' in the javascript context.
